verses.verse: Bless <WH1288> Jehovah <WH3068>, O my soul <WH5315>. O Jehovah <WH3068> my God <WH430>, thou art very <WH3966> great <WH1431>; Thou art clothed <WH3847> with honor <WH1935> and majesty <WH1926>:
Who coverest <WH5844> thyself with light <WH216> as with a garment <WH8008>; Who stretchest out <WH5186> the heavens <WH8064> like a curtain <WH3407>;

Who layeth the beams <WH7136> of his chambers <WH5944> in the waters <WH4325>; Who maketh <WH7760> the clouds <WH5645> his chariot <WH7398>; Who walketh <WH1980> upon the wings <WH3671> of the wind <WH7307>;
Who maketh <WH6213> winds <WH7307> his messengers <WH4397>; Flames <WH3857> of fire <WH784> his ministers <WH8334>;
Who laid <WH3245> the foundations <WH4349> of the earth <WH776>, That it should not be moved <WH4131> for ever <WH5769>.
Thou coveredst <WH3680> it with the deep <WH8415> as with a vesture <WH3830>; The waters <WH4325> stood <WH5975> above the mountains <WH2022>.
At <WH4480> thy rebuke <WH1606> they fled <WH5127>; At the voice <WH6963> of thy thunder <WH7482> they hasted away <WH2648>
(The mountains <WH2022> rose <WH5927>, the valleys <WH1237> sank down <WH3381>) Unto the place <WH4725> which <WH2088> thou hadst founded for them <WH3245>.
Thou hast set <WH7760> a bound <WH1366> that they may not pass over <WH5674>; That they turn not again <WH7725> to cover <WH3680> the earth <WH776>.
He sendeth <WH7971> forth springs <WH4599> into the valleys <WH5158>; They run <WH1980> among the mountains <WH2022>;
They give drink <WH8248> to every beast <WH2416> of the field <WH7704>; The wild asses <WH6501> quench <WH7665> their thirst <WH6772>.
By them the birds <WH5775> of the heavens <WH8064> have their habitation <WH7931>; They sing <WH5414> among <WH996> the branches <WH6073>.
He watereth <WH8248> the mountains <WH2022> from his chambers <WH5944>: The earth <WH776> is filled <WH7646> with the fruit <WH6529> of thy works <WH4639>.

He causeth the grass <WH2682> to grow <WH6779> for the cattle <WH929>, And herb <WH6212> for the service <WH5656> of man <WH120>; That he may bring forth <WH3318> food <WH3899> out of the earth <WH776>,

And wine <WH3196> that maketh glad <WH8055> the heart <WH3824> of man <WH582>, And oil <WH8081> to make his face <WH6440> to shine <WH6670>, And bread <WH3899> that strengtheneth <WH5582> man <WH582>'s heart <WH3824>.
The trees <WH6086> of Jehovah <WH3068> are filled <WH7646> with moisture <WH730>, The cedars of Lebanon <WH3844>, which he hath planted <WH5193>;
Where the birds <WH6833> make their nests <WH7077>: As for the stork <WH2624>, the fir-trees <WH1265> are her house <WH1004>.
The high <WH1364> mountains <WH2022> are for the wild goats <WH3277>; The rocks <WH5553> are a refuge <WH4268> for the conies <WH8227>.
He appointed <WH6213> the moon <WH3394> for seasons <WH4150>: The sun <WH8121> knoweth <WH3045> his going down <WH3996>.
Thou makest <WH7896> darkness <WH2822>, and it is night <WH3915>, Wherein all the beasts <WH2416> of the forest <WH3293> creep forth <WH7430>.
The young lions <WH3715> roar <WH7580> after their prey <WH2964>, And seek <WH1245> their food <WH400> from God <WH410>.
The sun <WH8121> ariseth <WH2224>, they get them away <WH622>, And lay them down <WH7257> in their dens <WH4585>.
Man <WH120> goeth forth <WH3318> unto his work <WH6467> And to his labor <WH5656> until the evening <WH6153>.
O Jehovah <WH3068>, how manifold <WH7231> are thy works <WH4639>! In wisdom <WH2451> hast thou made <WH6213> them all <WH776>: The earth is full <WH4390> of thy riches <WH7075>.
Yonder is the sea <WH3220>, great <WH1419> and wide <WH7342>, Wherein are things creeping <WH7431> innumerable <WH4557>, Both small <WH6996> and great <WH1419> beasts <WH2416>.
There go <WH1980> the ships <WH591>; There is leviathan <WH3882>, whom thou hast formed <WH3335> to play therein <WH7832>.
These wait <WH7663> all for thee <WH5414>, That thou mayest give them their food <WH400> in due season <WH6256>.
Thou givest <WH5414> unto them <WH3950>, they gather; Thou openest <WH6605> thy hand <WH3027>, they are satisfied <WH7646> with good <WH2896>.
Thou hidest <WH5641> thy face <WH6440>, they are troubled <WH926>; Thou takest away <WH622> their breath <WH7307>, they die <WH1478>, And return <WH7725> to their dust <WH6083>.
Thou sendest <WH7971> forth thy Spirit <WH7307>, they are created <WH1254>; And thou renewest <WH2318> the face <WH6440> of the ground <WH127>.
Let the glory <WH3519> of Jehovah <WH3068> endure for ever <WH5769>; Let Jehovah <WH3068> rejoice <WH8055> in his works <WH4639>:
Who looketh <WH5027> on the earth <WH776>, and it trembleth <WH7460>; He toucheth <WH5060> the mountains <WH2022>, and they smoke <WH6225>.
I will sing <WH7891> unto Jehovah <WH3068> as long as I live <WH2416>: I will sing <WH2167> praise to my God <WH430> while I have any being <WH5750>.
Let thy meditation <WH7879> be sweet <WH6149> unto him <WH8055>: I will rejoice in Jehovah <WH3068>.
Let sinners <WH2400> be consumed <WH8552> out of the earth <WH776>. And let the wicked <WH7563> be no more <WH1288>. Bless Jehovah <WH3068>, O my soul <WH5315>. Praise <WH1288> ye Jehovah <WH3068>.
